roleset.name: to violate a command or law
roleset.note: TRANSGRESS-V NOTES: No Vncls. Checked by Julia, 11/2010. (from transgress.01-v)

role.descr: Thing transgressed, law or command violated

example.name: Intransitive usage from Webtext
example.text: But we do not say anything except that troubles will befall a person who *T*-1 transgresses.
